short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays Pokémon information directly on Google search results!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly check a Pokémon's stats, types, and more with a quick google search. That way you'll have the info right away and you'll save clicks!  Just do a quick search with the name of the Pokémon as the first word and done!

Any questions, comments or features you'd like to see added, send a message to my email below.
